CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The optical band gap of the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) film is 1.13 eV , as estimated from the absorption onset ( 1100 nm ).

Let's think step by step.

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu): This is the name of the material. The acronym PDTP stands for Poly(diphenyl dilaminothiophene), and DTDPP(Bu) stands for 2,9-dithieno[3,2-b:2',3'-d]thiophene-5,5'-bis(but-3-yn-1-yl). So, the material name is PDTP - DTDPP(Bu).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The optical band gap of the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) film is 1.13 eV , as estimated from the absorption onset ( 1100 nm ).

Let's think step by step.

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu): This is the name of the film. It is a compound made up of PDTP and DTDPP(Bu). PDTP and DTDPP(Bu) are likely the names of the individual components.
2. Optical band gap: This is a property of the film. It refers to the energy required for an electron to make a transition from the valence band to the conduction band in the material.
3. 1.13 eV: This is the value of the optical band gap. It is a numerical value representing the energy in electron volts.
4. Absorption onset: This is a property of the film's absorption spectrum. It refers to the wavelength or energy at which absorption of light by the film begins.
5. 1100 nm: This is the value of the absorption onset. It is a numerical value representing the wavelength of light in nanometers.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. Optical band gap: This is a material property of the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) film. It refers to the energy required for an electron to make a transition from the valence band to the conduction band in the material.
2. 1.13 eV: This is the value of the optical band gap of the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) film. It is a numerical value representing the energy in electron volts.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Optical band gap of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) film |
| 1.13 eV (value of the optical band gap of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) film) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The optical band gap of the PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) film is 1.13 eV , as estimated from the absorption onset ( 1100 nm ).

Let's think step by step.

1. PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) film: This is a compound or material entity. It is not a property value, but rather the substance whose optical band gap is being described.
2. 1.13 eV: This is the property value being stated in the paragraph. It represents the optical band gap of the PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) film.
3. onset: This is not a property value, but rather a process or event (the absorption onset).
4. 1100 nm: This is a property value, representing the wavelength at which the absorption onset occurs.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. 1.13 eV: This is the property value being stated in the paragraph, representing the optical band gap of the PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) film.
2. 1100 nm: This is a property value, representing the wavelength of the absorption onset.

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties and their values.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Optical band gap of PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) film: 1.13 eV |
| Absorption onset wavelength: 1100 nm |

However, only the first row is the valid property value as per the context of the paragraph. The second row is included for completeness but it is not a property value of the material itself, but rather a process or event related to the material.
